summary_teim: Tom Waits, Leon Russell, and Neil Diamond are honored at the Rock Hall induction ceremonies. Waits, Judy Collins, and Dr. John perform.
summary_ssm: Tom Waits, Leon Russell, and Neil Diamond are honored at the Rock Hall induction ceremonies. Waits, Judy Collins, and Dr. John perform.
contents_teim: Jann Wenner introduces In Memoriam montage -- In Memoriam -- Neil Young inducts Tom Waits -- Waits accepts his award -- Elton John inducts Leon Russell -- Russell accepts his award -- Paul Simon inducts Neil Diamond -- Diamond accepts his award -- Make it rain ; Black rider ; The house where nobody lives (Tom Waits) -- Get behind the mule (Tom Waits and Neil Young) -- Both sides now (Judy Collins) -- Right place wrong time (Dr. John) -- Such a night (Dr. John and John Legend).
